Maven Erlang Plug-In Release Notes

Release History

VersionDateDescription
1.0.0-beta2010-12-17Initial release

Release 1.0.0-beta - 2010-12-17

TypeChangesBy
Changed the use of the "test" property, a single specified test (-Dtest=some_test) is always considered to have a .beam suffix, but never assumes anything else about the test module name.olle-t
New mojo that copies test-resources, bound to the generate-test-resources phase.olle-t
'TEST' was not set while compiling sources in testphase for coverage. Added setting of 'TEST' macro to the cover2:compile call.heyll
New parameter for the run goal, allowing optional command line parameters to be passed to the starting Erlang node.olle-t
Parameter in the package goal, controlling if the temporary directory is deleted or not.olle-t
Added mock system (formerly known as ltest_mock, formerly known as erlymock). The system is automatically available for test modules during the test phase.schlagert, heyll
Fixed various problems in test/compile phase when using include files from dependency applications.schlagert, heyll
Changed dialyzer to run on sources not beams.schlagert
New (fixed) surefire report generation handling each test module as separate test suite. Therefore an alternative surefire module is provided by the plugin.schlagert
Added run goal for packaging erlang-otp to compile/test and run an erlang/OTP application for easy testing.schlagert
Release file generation and management support.schlagert
Application file generation and management support.schlagert
Added initial site documentation, generation of plugin-docs, changes and some development/contribution information.olle-t
New coverage report, replacing the old one. Now includes line-coverage with annotated source code listings.olle-t
Fixed cover compilation with the export_all option to provide coverage reports for non-exported module functions. Therefore an alternative, patched cover module is provided by the plugin.schlagert
Added support for the maven-release-plugin by using application and release packaging variables in .app and .rel files.schlagert
Added possibility to include non-erlang sources into application packages.schlagert
Fixed different problems with release packaging.schlagert
Changed erlang-otp packaging to .tar.gz internally.schlagert
Added several unit and integration tests.schlagert
Rewritten all mojos from the original maven-erlang plugin.schlagert
Initial feature set: Compile project and test sourcesschlagert
Initial feature set: Execute eunit testsschlagert
Initial feature set: Execute dialyzer on erlang/OTP applications and releasesschlagert
Initial feature set: Generate site documentation with edoc for project and test code as well as surefire test reports and basic test code coverageschlagert
Initial feature set: Package erlang/OTP applicationsschlagert
Initial feature set: Package erlang/OTP releases (consisting of erlang/OTP applications)schlagert
Initial feature set: Project setup-goal, with defaults for site and changelog, main sources and tests.olle-t
